title: Top 10 EDGE Rushers & Defensive Linemen: Is Von Miller the biggest snub? (Football 7/7)
description:
We turn our attention to defensive rankings this week as Ryan Wilson joins Will Brinson to break down his lists for Top 10 EDGE rushers and Top 10 defensive linemen in the league entering 2020. The guys first address the EDGE. Von Miller isn't in Ryan's Top 10 and he caught some heat online for that. Does Brinson disagree too? Which Bosa will be better this season: Joey or Nick? Additionally, the Watt brothers have some interesting landing spots that you won't want to miss.
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS
